cells.data: -- approxRatio :: Real -> Real -> Ratioon approxRatio(epsilon, n)	if epsilon is missing value then		set e to 1 / 10000	else		set e to epsilon	end if		script gcde		on |λ|(e, x, y)			script _gcd				on |λ|(a, b)					if b < e then						a					else						|λ|(b, a mod b)					end if				end |λ|			end script			|λ|(abs(x), abs(y)) of _gcd		end |λ|	end script		set c to |λ|(e, 1, n) of gcde	Ratio((n div c), (1 div c))end approxRatio
